content: "http://www.boston.com/news/local/breaking_news/2009/04/sources_craigsl.html" "Police searching the Quincy apartment of Philip Markoff found underwear from two of the victims in the Craigslist attacks and a handgun hidden in a hollowed-out copy of the medical textbook Gray's Anatomy of the Human Body, according to a law enforcement official with knowledge of the investigation." Well looks like this pretty much raps up this case. This guy is 1 sick freak. Then again, if he can find OJ's "dream team", he may be able to get off.

content: He kept the weapon, the duct tape, and momentos all at his house. He was captured on camera. There are plenty of witnesses that can place him at the scene. Yup, he's done for. Anyone else surprised that he has a spotless criminal history, yet was robbing and killing prostitutes? Scary!
